text: Refund was an American Thoroughbred racehorse. Ridden by Fred Littlefield, he won the 1888 Preakness Stakes. ==Pedigree== ==References== Category:1885 racehorse births Category:Thoroughbred family 4-r Category:Racehorses bred in Maryland Category:Racehorses trained in the United States Category:Preakness Stakes winners
title: Refund (horse)
